About Me

Enjoy Coding | Machine Learning | Big Data


Hi, Nice to meet you!
My name is Zinuo Li. I am currently a MS computer science student in Illinois Institute of Technology.

Code

5000 lines in Python and Java. 1000 lines in C++, C, SQL

Frameworks

Proficient user in Git. Experienced in using Django to develop true industry work. Capable of using tensorflow to solve basic machine learning and deep learning problems.

Projects

Automatic Text Summarization
  • Python | Machine Learning | text-similarity
    • Established a python program which one only need to provide the http address, the program would scrape the paragraph in that page directly and generate the single-sentence summary.
    • Analyzed the different approach method by comparing the differences among similarity measurements covered in data mining including tf-idf, word2vec, bm25plus etc.
    Check it out
    Build Tiny Database
  • C, buffer manager, B+-Tree structure
    • Designed a tiny database that allows navigation through records and inserting and deleting records.
    • Implemented a disk-based B+-tree index structure to reduce the time consuming of data retrieving and manipulating.
    • Installed a buffer managerto manage a buffer of blocks in memory and different block replacement method.
    Check it out
